item.title: Shadowmatic
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description: Shadowmatic (MOD, Hints/Unlocked) – cool puzzle game on Android device. The game is built on its own independent engine, with an excellent study of graphics and music. The main goal of the game is to twist and arrange objects so that they cast a shadow into needed shapes.
